author: dario-piotrowicz
message:
fix(docs-infra): move security anchors outside callout elements (#43865)

two callout elements in the security guide have anchors
as their first child element instead of the callout's header
causing ugly/unwanted spacing, move the anchors above the
callout elements to fix such issue

PR Close #43865

files.patch:
@@ -8,9 +8,10 @@ For more information about the attacks and mitigations described below, see [OWA You can run the in Stackblitz and download the code from there. +{@a report-issues} +

Reporting vulnerabilities
To report vulnerabilities in Angular itself, email us at [security@angular.io](mailto:security@angular.io). @@ -20,9 +21,10 @@ philosophy](https://www.google.com/about/appsecurity/).
